import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Source/Styles/Home.css' import { Context } from '../Context' import { useContext } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import api, { API_URL } from '../http' import '../Source/Styles/Transfer.css' import { useState } from 'react' import PhoneInput from 'react-phone-input-2' import Downshift from 'downshift' export default function Home(props) { const items = [ { name: 'ПИРВА КАФИДРА' }, { name: 'ВТОРА КАФИДРА' }, { name: 'ТРЕТЯ КАФИДРА' }, { name: 'ЧЕТВЭРТА КАФИДРА' }, { name: 'ПЯТА КАФИДРА' }, ] const [departments,setDepartments]=useState(); const { setCurrentPage, store, setAuth } = useContext(Context) useEffect(() => setCurrentPage('/transfer'), []) useEffect(()=>axios.get(API_URL+"/departments/all").then(response=>setDepartments(response.data[0])),[]) const [imgTransfer, setImgTransfer] = useState('') const [imgMarks, setImgMarks] = useState('') function Validatesemseter(e) { e.target.value = e.target.value.replace(/[^\d]/g, '') } return (
